Featured-image: CH1507-royal-mother-of-the-bride-evening-dress-with-ruffle-jacket_p.jpg

----

Description: An elegant mother of the bride gown. The strapless lace bodice with chiffon skirt falls to the floor with movement. There is a slight pleating at the waistline. The bodice can be covered with a ruffled chiffon, three quarter length sleeved jacket. Perfect for anyone looking for a more conservative look.
